Posts.EditableText:
I have uploaded a new version of the library to the Wiki page; try that.

The issue was that the type "list" no longer is recognised, it has to be "stringlist", so you could search the library for that (with quotes).

Thanks for bringing it to my attention.
Posts.HTML:
